release.action: Enable validation of JSON and Sightly HTML files by default.
Update to wcmio-content-package-maven-plugin 1.2.2.
Update global-parent dependency to 11.

Add full support of OSGi DS and Metatype annotations and remove Maven SCR Plugin. Felix SCR annotations are still supported as well, but it is recommended to migrate to OSGi annotations. Support for Felix SCR annotations will be removed in the future. You should remove all maven-scr-plugin invocations from your POMs with this update!
org.apache.felix.scr.annotations are no longer included as default provided dependency, but are still supported if included explicitly.
Increase wcmio-content-package-maven-plugin retryCount to make deployment of AEM service packs more reliable.
Update to latest wcm.io Maven Plugins.

Update build plugins to latest versions.

Enable strict mode for maven-scr-plugin and define execution of scr goal by default.
